author: crioyo
title: #174 Valencianos explotan contra una nueva actividad para turistas en la que recorren la ciudad bailando
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#33](c33#c-33) pueden bailar lo que les de la gana en su casa‚Ä¶ o en un sitio que sea para bailar. Y a mi esto me parece que est√° muy bien para que pase un d√≠a o dos. El tener a unos colgados con cascos todos los dias delante de tu casa haciendo el mongol no creo que sea agradable.
[#106](c106#c-106) Ese es el que es p√∫blico, que cualquiera por 18‚Ç¨ se puede apuntar. Los privados de las DESPEDIDAS, CUMPLEA√ëOS, EMPRESAS, que anuncian en sus p√°ginas no cuentan para molestar, verdad?
[#28](c28#c-28) Tienes un v√≠deo en la noticia.
Ocupan bastante espacio p√∫blico y como actividad tur√≠stica no tiene micho sentido, pero claro, en el tiempo en que nos ha tocado vivir donde hay que presumir de hacer algo "distinto" y por supuesto colgarlo/comentarlo en las redes sociales...
[#31](c31#c-31) Me apostar√≠a 100‚Ç¨ a que si por tu barrio pasaran estos grupos cada 10 min haciendo el monguer ser√≠as el primero en cagarte en la puta madre de todos los santos.
[#57](c57#c-57) No s√© las drogas, las armas y el juego generan mucho dinero, pero estas si parece que se pueden criticar
[#67](c67#c-67) si que molestan, est√°n usando una gran porci√≥n de la v√≠a para un evento privado. Adem√°s de ser ruidoso y molesto, hay quien no le puede agradar que una visita a una cuidad se convierta en un musical.
[#133](c133#c-133) ¬øRuidoso el que? si llevan auriculares el sonido normal de gente caminando y como llevan auriculares ni siquiera hablan. Ruidoso son los coches y motos, y la gente dando voces en las terrazas.
[#78](c78#c-78) Pues un poco S√≠, porque los dem√°s tambi√©n aguantar√°n TUS ESTUPIDECES en alg√∫n momento.
Si vas a cenar a una terraza - Molestas a los vecinos que se levantan a las 5AM
Si tus hijos juegan con un bal√≥n en el parque - Molestan a los ancianitos que le dan de comer a las palomas...
Y as√≠ todo.
Si no sois capaces de aguantar nada iros a vivir al campo o como ermita√±os.
[#116](c116#c-116) el parque es un sitio de juegos.
Si quieren hacer zoomba que vayan al parque o un gimnasio.
Lo de la terraza lo veo igual de mal.
Puedes estar en una terraza sin tener que estar a gritos, tambi√©n.
[#116](c116#c-116) > porque los dem√°s tambi√©n aguantar√°n TUS ESTUPIDECES
No. Por lo general, al estar dotado de dignidad, evito hacer estupideces en p√∫blico.
> Si vas a cenar a una terraza - Molestas a los vecinos que se levantan a las 5AM
Si ceno en un restaurante evito las terrazas. Paso de aguantar el humo ajeno, ruido de tr√°fico, cucarachas y contenedores de la basura a dos pasos.
> Si tus hijos juegan con un bal√≥n en el parque - Molestan a los ancianitos que le dan de comer a las palomas...
¬øMe est√°s comparando estos "adultos" con ni√±os de unos pocos a√±os? Te lo compro. No dan para m√°s.
> Si no sois capaces de aguantar nada iros a vivir al campo o como ermita√±os.
Que se vaya a vivir al campo el que molesta, no el que intenta vivir tranquilo.
[#69](c69#c-69) Primero los ciclistas, luego los patinetes, ahora los turistas con cascos el gran problema de seguridad vial.
[#64](c64#c-64) hasta que quieres salir del portal y te encuentras a 15 monguers caminando a ritmo de Thriller (tres pasitos, manos. Tres pasitos, manos)...
[#1](c1#c-1) Tambi√©n te digo una cosa, entre estos y las despedidas de soltero/a con esc√°ndalos impresionantes a cualquier hora me quedo con lo primero.
Lo que si me parece de c√°rcel es el "uniforme" que le han puesto a los gu√≠as, un cruce entre un lim√≥n y el chavo del ocho
[#49](c49#c-49) El otro d√≠a en el trabajo un americano me pregunt√≥: "¬ø A d√≥nde va un Espa√±ol cuando quiere ir de vacaciones? "
Me cago en los muertos de catetos y caciques que han apostado fuertesimo al turismo.
[#155](c155#c-155) Si veis como algo positivo que seamos el resort de occidente, que de puertas para afuera solo somos turismo, pues fale üòÄ
A ver la frase fue mas bien "A donde vas de vacaciones cuando vives en Espa√±a"
[#157](c157#c-157) pues ya te digo, desde la distancia y sin conoceros ni a tu compa√±ero ni a ti, me parece un pregunta fruto de la curiosidad.
[#4](c4#c-4)
Resumir la avalancha de turismo que se sufre en muchas capitales de √©ste pa√≠s diciendo que les molesta que la gente se lo pase bien es demagogia nivel dios.
Todo tiene un l√≠mite, las ciudades tambi√©n, y en muchas est√°n superando el l√≠mite de convivencia y de capacidad para que una ciudad siga siendo y funcionando para que sus habitantes vivan.
Se tomar√°n medidas contra √©sta locura, no lo dudo, porque es un problema que crece al mismo ritmo que la mala educaci√≥n de la gente.
Esta cr√≠tica refleja el sentimiento de una parte de la poblaci√≥n que se siente marginada en su propia ciudad, desplazada por actividades que, aunque novedosas y atractivas para los visitantes, alteran la vida cotidiana de los residentes.
La controversia en torno a Bailaloloco Silent Disco Tour es solo un ejemplo m√°s del complejo equilibrio que Valencia intenta mantener entre el desarrollo tur√≠stico y la preservaci√≥n de su identidad y calidad de vida para sus habitantes.
Suena a ChatGPT.
[#1](c1#c-1) No estoy en contra, quiz√°s deben limitar el n√∫mero de asistentes para que no molesten tanto. Se ve que el grupo es bastante grande.
[#20](c20#c-20) Ingresos para qui√©n y c√≥mo? Cada actividad humana tiene diferentes externalidades negativas, en el caso del turismo las estamos viendo ahora y estamos decidiendo si las queremos o no.
Se ha vendido el pa√≠s (su arquitectura, paisajes, hasta las casas mismas...) y los beneficios han ido a cuatro empresarios hoteleros. Muerte a este modelo!!!
[#20](c20#c-20) Amen por esa ultima frase.
A mi el turismo solo me quita capacidad de consumo.
Que si, que los hosteleros pagan impuestos. Pero en Valencia ya no puedo tomarme una birra por 1,5‚Ç¨, y alwuilar una casa ni te cuento.
[#80](c80#c-80) era muy bueno ese programa, yo recuerdo al hombre que siempre segu√≠a la l√≠nea blanca, simplemente genial
El ser humano cuando se convierte en turista est√° demostrado que se vuelve (o nos volvemos, no quiero ser m√°s que nadie) gilipollas, bailar por la calle como un poseso, ir por el centro de la calle para hacerte fotos(salir de casa te pone la armadura de Ironman, si te atropella un üöï no duele), beber sin control....
[#41](c41#c-41) Te compro lo de los alquileres pero creo que eso es un problema de regulaci√≥n, se est√°n utilizando unas infraestructuras (viviendas familiares) para una actividad que no le corresponde. Y no es solo provocado por grandes corporaciones que hay much√≠simos particulares que tambi√©n la practican y se benefician bastante. Vivo de alquiler y me veo afectado directamente por esto.
En cuanto a los sueldos m√≠seros pues tambi√©n, pero nos es un problema del turismo ¬øCrees que hay oferta en otros sectores con mejores sueldos? ¬øCrees que se podr√≠a prohibir esta actividad en alguna ciudad y mandar a la gente del sector a trabajar en el campo, repartos, construcci√≥n o cualquier otro sector?
[#123](c123#c-123) para empezar usan la v√≠a p√∫blica para dar un servicio que bloquea e invade con ruido y espacio.
No es muy diferente que un a terraza delante de un bar. Solo que estas mierdas son m√≥viles.
Luego, y esto ya es m√°s subjetivo, est√° en disonancia con una visita tur√≠stica.
Una cosa es una visita tur√≠stica y otra hacer deporte y baile. Las dos ala vez es un sinsentido. Que te gusta ver a gente haciendo el canelo? Perfecto. A m√≠ me disgusta y me fuerza a no estar cerca, porque me produce rechazo y verg√ºenza. Adem√°s de ser una afrenta al patrimonio de una ciudad, hacer una visita haciendo el tolai.

author: Surbhi Pathak
title: Rain Likely To Spoil New Year's Celebrations As IMD Predicts Rainfall In These States; Check Weather Prediction For December 31 And January 1 | India News | Zee News
text: Rain Likely To Spoil New Year's Celebrations As IMD Predicts Rainfall In These States; Check Weather Prediction For December 31 And January 1 The IMD has predicted heavy rainfall in Tamil Nadu on New Year's eve, scroll down to check forecast for all states. Trending Photos New Delhi: The New Year is almost here, and you've probably prepared to say bye to 2023 and hello to 2024. But, there's a hitch ‚Äì rain might mess up your plans. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) says there'll be heavy rain in many states in the next 3-4 days. According to IMD's weather bulletin, light rainfall is likely over Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh from December 31 to Jan 2, 2024. Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand and East Rajasthan are also likely to witness rainfall during the next 2-3 days. The IMD has predicted, light to moderate rainfall over south Tamil Nadu and Kerala from Dec 31 to Jan 3, 2024. Heavy rainfall is also likely over southern part of Tamil Nadu on Dec 31 and January 1, 2024. Meanwhile, the dense fog continued to persist over Northwestern India lowering the visibility in several parts of the region. Dense to very dense fog blankets covered the many most parts of Punjab, Haryana, Chandigarh and Delhi and some parts of Uttar Pradesh and isolated pockets over Jammu and Kashmir, Northwest Rajasthan and Northwest Madhya Pradesh. Fog Observed (0530 IST of today): Very dense fog in isolated pockets of Jammu-Kashmir, Punjab, Haryana-Chandigarh, U.P, west Rajasthan; moderate to dense fog in isolated pockets of Delhi, East Raj.; Shallow to moderate fog in isolated pockets of West M.P, Jharkhand, Odisha,Bihar. [pic.twitter.com/tqY6B73iw1]‚Äî India Meteorological Department (@Indiametdept) [December 29, 2023] Dense fog conditions are likely to persist in the above-mentioned regions, however, conditions may improve gradually from Dec 31, stated IMD. Live Tv

author: malvern-online.com
title: Better Way Roofing: Transforming Roofs with Expertise and Excellence | User | malvern-online.com
text:
Shipshewana, IN - December 26, 2024 - Better Way Roofing, a trusted name in the roofing industry, continues to deliver unparalleled roofing solutions tailored to meet diverse needs. Specializing in residential roofing services and commercial roofing services, the company has established a reputation for professionalism and superior craftsmanship.
As a local roofing company, Better Way Roofing understands the unique challenges posed by varying climates and architectural styles. This expertise enables the team to provide roofing solutions that not only protect properties but also enhance aesthetic appeal and value.
Comprehensive Residential Roofing Services
Better Way Roofing's commitment to excellence is evident in its approach to residential roofing services. The company offers comprehensive solutions, including roof inspections, repairs, replacements, and installations. Each project is managed with precision, ensuring long-lasting durability and enhanced curb appeal.
The team employs high-quality materials and cutting-edge techniques, safeguarding homes against harsh weather conditions. By prioritizing safety and sustainability, Better Way Roofing ensures that every residential roof stands the test of time.
Trusted Commercial Roofing Services
For businesses, roofing solutions must balance durability and efficiency. Better Way Roofing excels in providing commercial roofing services tailored to the needs of diverse industries. The company handles everything from small-scale repairs to large-scale installations, offering solutions that meet industry standards and timelines.
Specialists work closely with property managers to identify the best materials and designs for each project, ensuring minimal disruption to business operations. This meticulous approach has earned Better Way Roofing recognition as a go-to provider for commercial properties.
Why Choose Better Way Roofing?
What sets Better Way Roofing apart is its unwavering commitment to delivering results that exceed expectations. As a local roofing company, the team focuses on personalized service, taking into account the unique requirements of each property.
The company also prioritizes transparency in pricing and operations, offering clients peace of mind. From initial consultations to project completion, every detail is handled professionally and carefully.
Accessible Roofing Solutions
Better Way Roofing invites homeowners and business owners to explore its range of services through its comprehensive website. More information about its residential roofing services can be found here. Businesses seeking robust roofing solutions can learn more about its commercial roofing services here.
With a proven track record and a commitment to innovation, Better Way Roofing is poised to remain a leader in the roofing industry. By combining expertise, reliability, and exceptional service, the company continues to set the benchmark for quality roofing solutions.
About Better Way Roofing
Better Way Roofing is a premier provider of roofing solutions specializing in both residential and commercial projects. Known for quality craftsmanship and exceptional customer service, the company is a reliable partner for all roofing needs.
Media Contact

author: Richard Li
title: Groupe BGI : Lutter contre la SLA un g√®ne apr√®s l‚Äôautre - Brazil Business Today - EIN Presswire
text:
Groupe BGI : Lutter contre la SLA un g√®ne apr√®s l‚Äôautre La SLA affecte les neurones moteurs, perturbant ainsi toute communication entre le cerveau et les muscles. Cela peut conduire √† une paralysie progressive et √† l'incapacit√© de bouger, de parler, d'avaler et finalement de respirer.
Le 7 juin 2024, M. Cai Lei (√† gauche) et le Dr Yin Ye ont sign√© un accord de coop√©ration strat√©gique pour √©tablir officiellement le ¬´ Cai Lei & BGI ALS Multi-omics Research Joint Laboratory ¬ª.
SHENZHEN, CHINA, June 24, 2024 / EINPresswire.com / -- La Scl√©rose Lat√©rale Amyotrophique (SLA) est une maladie rare et terrifiante qui touche plus de 200 000 personnes √† travers le monde. Elle affecte les neurones moteurs, emp√™chant ainsi toute communication entre le cerveau et les muscles. Cela peut conduire √† une paralysie progressive et √† l'incapacit√© de bouger, de parler, d'avaler et finalement de respirer.
Stephen Hawking, c√©l√®bre physicien th√©oricien, a v√©cu 55 ans avec la SLA, mais pour de nombreuses personnes, le taux de survie est inf√©rieur √† un dixi√®me de ce chiffre.
Comprendre les causes de la SLA est une premi√®re √©tape cruciale vers la recherche d‚Äôun traitement. M√™me si la recherche en g√©nomique peut y contribuer, elle ne constitue pas une solution simple comme l'explique le PDG du groupe BGI, le Dr Yin Ye : ¬´ Il s'agit d'une maladie complexe. Les causes exactes de la SLA ne sont pas claires. Elles peuvent √™tre li√©es √† l'√¢ge et aux traumatismes physiques. Nous devons trouver les facteurs cl√©s qui induisent la SLA, en comparer les diff√©rences g√©n√©tiques entre les patients SLA et les personnes en bonne sant√©¬ª.
Dans le cadre de son engagement √† trouver une solution pour la SLA, le Dr. Yin, en collaboration avec M. Cai Lei, ancien cadre de JD.com et atteint de SLA, a lanc√© un programme en 2023 visant √† fournir gratuitement un programme de s√©quen√ßage et d'analyse du g√©nome entier aux patients atteints de SLA.
¬´ La premi√®re phase du programme a s√©quenc√© et analys√© 184 √©chantillons provenant de 74 lign√©es familiales ¬ª, explique le Dr Yin. ¬´ Les r√©sultats ont √©t√© encourageant. Nous avons d√©tect√© environ six fois plus de loci g√©n√©tiques suspect√©s que lors des tests traditionnels¬ª.
Les tests ont √©galement indiqu√© qu'il serait utile de proc√©der au s√©quen√ßage du g√©nome entier des familles. En octobre 2023, le Dr Yin a annonc√© des tests suppl√©mentaires gratuits de s√©quen√ßage du g√©nome entier pour 200 lign√©es familiales, et l'utilisation de la technologie de pr√©l√®vement de sang la plus r√©cente de BGI qui est plus pratique pour les patients et peut fournir des r√©sultats plus pr√©cis.
Par ailleurs, BGI √©tudie la possibilit√© d'utiliser sa technologie de pointe en mati√®re de multiomique spatiale, Stereo-seq, pour analyser les relations entre les cellules et comprendre leurs interactions au fil du temps ainsi que leurs mutations.
Stereo-seq int√®gre diverses avanc√©es scientifiques et combine des r√©seaux de nanobilles d'ADN (DNB) et la capture in situ de l'ARN pour cr√©er un s√©quen√ßage omique √† r√©solution spatiale am√©lior√©e. La plus grande puce de s√©quen√ßage Stereo-seq mesure 13 cm √ó 13 cm, soit 500 fois plus que la zone de capture des autres technologies transcriptomiques spatiales, de sorte qu'il est possible d'analyser une section tissulaire compl√®te d'un organe de grande taille. Avec sa r√©solution de 500 nm, elle permet √©galement de pr√©senter chaque processus biologique avec une r√©solution in√©dite.
Ces avanc√©es permettent aux scientifiques de dresser une cartographie compl√®te des types et des √©tats cellulaires, ce qui leur permet d'examiner non seulement les cellules individuelles, mais aussi les relations entre les cellules au sein du microenvironnement. Plus encore, ils peuvent m√™me cartographier les cellules dans le temps, voir comment elles grandissent et √©voluent, organe par organe, et cr√©er des atlas physiologiques.
Le 7 juin 2024, M. Cai Lei et le Dr Yin Ye ont annonc√© la mise sur pied du "Cai Lei & BGI ALS Multi-omics Research Joint Laboratory," qui a pour but d'acc√©l√©rer la recherche sur la SLA.
Si beaucoup ont abdiqu√© face √† la SLA, le Dr Yin y voit un espoir : ¬´ J'entrevois un avenir prometteur dans la recherche sur les maladies rares, car nous disposons de nouveaux outils essentiels qui nous permettent d'√©tudier les fondements de la SLA. Les progr√®s du s√©quen√ßage √† haut d√©bit et l'√©mergence de tests g√©n√©tiques plus abordables acc√©l√®rent sans aucun doute le processus de d√©cryptage de la SLA ¬ª.
¬´ J'esp√®re de tout c≈ìur que dans les prochaines ann√©es, nous serons en mesure de r√©aliser des avanc√©es significatives dans la recherche des causes de la SLA et d'un √©ventuel traitement ¬ª. A-t-il ajout√©.Richard Li
BGI Group

author: Importer
title: Government of Canada Champions Sustainable Jobs, Inclusivity, Innovation at GLOBE Forum | finanzen.net
text: VANCOUVER, BC, Feb. 15, 2024 /CNW/ - As countries around the world turn to Canada as a supplier of choice for clean energy, critical minerals and clean technologies, Canada continues to work with innovators, Indigenous partners and youth through fora such as the GLOBE Forum to help communities seize the economic opportunities presented by ambitious climate action.This week, Parliamentary Secretary Julie Dabrusin represented the Government of Canada at GLOBE Forum 2024 in Vancouver, B.C., to advance action toward net-zero innovation and inclusive economic growth with partners. The Parliamentary Secretary attended on behalf of the Honourable Jonathan Wilkinson, Minister of Energy and Natural Resources, and the Honourable Steven Guilbeault, Minister of Environment and Climate Change.While at GLOBE, Parliamentary Secretary Dabrusin:Championed the government's vision for clean growth through her participation in key sessions with youth, industry innovators and women leaders in the energy sector, highlighting Canada's commitments to creating sustainable, high-quality jobs for youth and to achieving gender equality and broader inclusion, diversity, equity and accessibility in the energy sector ‚Äî including through Equal by 30.Hosted GLOBE's Clean Tech Pitch Panel with seven of the 13 Canadian companies named to the 2024 Global Cleantech 100 list and joined businesses involved in the Net-Zero Challenge, who discussed their motivations and experience as well as the challenges, opportunities and lessons learned in planning and pursuing net-zero commitments.Jointly convened industry and community leaders to discuss climate-resilient infrastructure and housing and climate-proofing Canadian communities through collaborations across governments and sectors with the Honourable Sean Fraser, Canada's Minister of Housing, Infrastructure and Communities.Parliamentary Secretary Dabrusin also jointly announced ‚Äî with the Federation of Canadian Municipalities (FCM) ‚Äî an investment of over $900,000 through the Green Municipal Fund (GMF) to support local climate action projects in six communities across British Columbia. By supporting municipal initiatives that reduce emissions and enhance resiliency, Canada is working collaboratively to deliver for British Columbians. The Parliamentary Secretary then visited Vancouver's Firehall No.17, one of Canada's first net-zero fire halls, where she met with local firefighters.The Government of Canada is supporting clean technology innovation, the creation of good jobs and meaningful partnerships. Canada is dedicated to the active participation of women, youth, Indigenous Peoples, immigrants, racialized peoples and persons with disabilities in building a sustainable and prosperous future on the road to net zero.Quotes"I am pleased to be at GLOBE, connecting with women, young people, Indigenous partners and innovators in our growing clean technology sector. The imperative of climate action presents a huge opportunity for enhancing community resilience, driving economic inclusion and spurring job creation in every single part of our country. This week's roundtables with Canadian leaders, alongside new federal investments here in British Columbia, are helping us to advance the important work of building strong communities."Julie DabrusinParliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Energy and Natural Resources and to the Minister of Environment and Climate Change"At this year's GLOBE Forum, the Government of Canada connected with clean technology innovators including many Indigenous partners, young people and women leaders to advance discussions on our shared energy and resource future. By investing in innovation and sustainable jobs, and by responsibly advancing resource partnerships, we are positioned to help lead the world in building a sustainable, resilient and prosperous future ‚Äî including for our communities here in B.C. and across Canada."The Honourable Jonathan WilkinsonMinister of Energy and Natural Resources"TBC"The Honourable Steven Guilbeault,Minister of Environment and Climate Change"The Government of Canada's investments in infrastructure across Canada are helping to protect homes, businesses and communities from climate-related risks like floods and wildfires. As we work together with our partners to build more homes for Canadians at prices they can afford, we will continue to help build housing that is resilient to the effects of climate change. By taking action on climate-resilient housing and infrastructure across the country, we can protect our communities now and for the future."The Honourable Sean FraserMinister of Housing, Infrastructure and CommunitiesRelated InformationGLOBE Forum 2024Science and Technology Internship Program ‚Äì Green JobsFederation of Canadian MunicipalitiesGovernment of Canada and FCM Fund Municipal Climate Action Across British ColumbiaFollow us on LinkedIn SOURCE Natural Resources Canada

author: La Gaceta
title: Paro de aeron√°uticos en Aeroparque afecta a miles de pasajeros: hay demoras y cancelaciones
text: Los pasajeros que ten√≠an vuelos programados para este viernes hacia o desde Aeroparque Jorge Newbery sufrir√°n complicaciones por un paro parcial del aeron√°utico. Los gremios anunciaron asambleas desde las 8 que se repetir√°n a lo largo de toda la jornada. Por eso, algunas compa√±√≠as trasladan sus vuelos a Ezeiza. La Asociaci√≥n Pilotos de L√≠neas A√©reas (APLA) har√° asambleas informativas de 8 a 11, mientras que el personal de Intercargo, de 9 a 12. Esto llev√≥ a que vuelos que se dirigen a Iguaz√∫ a las 9.50, Salta a las 10.10, San Mart√≠n de los Andes, Salta 11.46, se encuentran demorados. Por el momento no se cancelaron viajes. Aerol√≠neas Argentinas y Flybondi decidieron trasladar algunos de sus vuelos dom√©sticos y regionales hacia Ezeiza. La l√≠nea de bandera traslad√≥ siete vuelos: AR1760 (destino Posadas, Misiones - 72 pasajeros) AR1824 (destino Comodoro Rivadavia, Chubut - 54 pasajeros) AR1894 (destino El Calafate, Santa Cruz - 146 pasajeros) AR1308 (destino Gale√£o, Brasil - 135 pasajeros) AR1654 (destino Chapelco, Neuqu√©n - 131 pasajeros) AR1878 (destino Ushuaia, Tierra del Fuego - 167 pasajeros) AR1240 (destino San Pablo, Brasil - 118 pasajeros) Flybondi anunci√≥ que 10 de sus viajes fueron trasladados a Ezeiza, cuatro son arribos y seis son partidas. ‚ÄúLa aerol√≠nea lamenta las molestias ocasionadas a sus pasajeros debido a medidas de fuerza adoptadas por trabajadores ajenos a la empresa‚Äù, indic√≥ la empras en un comunicado de prensa. Por su parte, Aerol√≠neas Argentina denunci√≥ que estas medidas de fuerza se tratan de ‚Äúparos encubiertos‚Äù. "Se recomienda a los viajeros revisar sus correos electr√≥nicos, contactarse con sus agencias de viaje en caso de compras indirectas, o verificar el estado de su vuelo ingresando a aerolineas.com", inform√≥ a trav√©s de un comunicado.

author: Aaron Liddle
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Officially Gets 2025 Release Date for Nintendo Switch 2
text:
Hollow Knight: Silksong is set for a 2025 release on Nintendo Switch 2. Revealed during the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct, packed with exciting announcements, the game and release date were shown during a sizzle reel showcasing a variety of upcoming titles for the new console. This marks the first official release window provided for the game, which has been in development for several years, rekindling excitement among fans eager for its launch.
A Long-Awaited Update
Hollow Knight: Silksong was first revealed in 2019 as a sequel to Hollow Knight, the critically-acclaimed Metroidvania that captivated players with its challenging combat, intricate world design and deep lore. Originally conceived as DLC, Silksong quickly grew in scope and was reimagined as a full-fledged standalone game.
Since its announcement, Team Cherry has remained relatively silent regarding the game‚Äôs development progress, leading to speculation and anxious anticipation among fans. Recently, Hollow Knight: Silksong's Steam page was updated for the first time in 6 years, leading many to speculate that the game was gearing up for release. The 2025 release date shown in the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct finally confirms that the game is indeed releasing soon.
What to Expect from Silksong
In Silksong, players take on the role of Hornet, a fierce warrior and princess protector of Hallownest, as she journeys through a new kingdom filled with mysterious foes and intricate landscapes. Unlike Hollow Knight, which emphasized an exploratory and methodical approach to combat, Silksong seems to be introducing a faster, more acrobatic fighting style, taking advantage of Hornet‚Äôs agility and expanded moveset.

The game will feature over 150 unique enemies, a crafting system, and an original soundtrack composed by Christopher Larkin, who scored the first game. Players will also have access to a questing system that offers side objectives, expanding upon the rich lore of the Hollow Knight universe.
Will Silksong Release This Year?
Whilst it is exciting to finally receive such a promising update for Hollow Knight: Silksong, it's important to note that delays have become far too prominent within the gaming industry. Whilst there are many who are excited about a release this year, there are many who are also skeptical about this release date, especially given the lack of any concrete month for the release.
Regardless, it's exciting to receive an official update about the game at all. The extended development period has led to speculation that Silksong will be significantly larger in scope than its predecessor. Team Cherry has remained tight-lipped about the finer details, but the confirmation of a 2025 release ensures that fans can finally mark their calendars for one of the most-anticipated indie releases in recent memory.
Whilst there are many who are excited about a release this year, there are many who are also skeptical about this release date, especially given the lack of any concrete month for the release.
With Hollow Knight: Silksong finally on the horizon, anticipation continues to build. As Team Cherry releases more details leading up to its launch, fans can look forward to experiencing Hornet‚Äôs long-awaited journey in a new, beautifully-crafted world.
